item.title: List
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - CUSTOMERS > CUSTOMERS - LIST Grid CustomerGridDefinitionFactory.php Default action in the button: Edit Other available actions in the menu: View, Delete Row action: View Row action does not apply to the ID’s checkbox column and to columns with enable/disable actions.
